result.arabic_text: مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ فَرَّقُواْ دِينَهُمۡ وَكَانُواْ شِيَعٗاۖ كُلُّ حِزۡبِۭ بِمَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ فَرِحُونَ
result.translation: Mu biciyemwo utugwitugwi mw’idini ryabo, baraheza bubahiriza amwe mu mabwirizwa y’Imana Allah, bahakana bivuye inyuma ayandi bisunze ivyipfuzo vyabo, gutyo haduka utudumbidumbi twisunga ingingo z’abaturongoye, buri kagwi kose muri two kishimira ivyiyumviro vyako gusa.
